name: Emily's Famous Chili
author: HBIC
summary: This is a spicy but flavorful chili made with meat! Children may want to eat something else for dinner because this is just too spicy!  Dollop some sour cream on top when serving to soften the blow to your tastebuds when you experience my chili masterpiece!
ingredients: 2  red bell peppers, seeded and diced
4 (15 ounce) cans kidney beans with liquid
1 (7 ounce) can chipotle peppers in adobo sauce
directions: In a large pot over medium-high heat, cook beef until brown
Stir in onions, bell peppers and jalapenos and cook until tender
Stir in garlic and cook 1 minute more
Season with chili powder, cumin, salt and pepper
Stir in the tomato paste and kidney beans with their liquid
In a food processor or blender, puree the tomatoes with the chipotle peppers until smooth
Stir into the pot with 3 cups of water
Combine the remaining 1 cup water with the flour in a jar and shake to combine
Pour into the chili and stir in the vinegar
